title: Passenger journeys on the Manchester Metrolink in the United Kingdom 1992 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Passenger journeys in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 27.
In general Passenger journeys in millions has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012/13 and 2013/14.
The highest Passenger journeys in millions, of value 43.7 was reached at Year 2018/19
Minimum Passenger journeys in millions about 8.1 was reached at Year 1992/93
